Who We Are

The clinic offers state of the art technology and equipment and a warm and welcoming environment for patients. We provide high quality dental implant treatments and a wide spectrum of cosmetic dental treatments including bridges, crowns, whitening and many more.

 

Odysseos dental clinic is conveniently located at a central location in Nicosia, easy to access from the main high way connecting all major cities and is also ten minutes away from the city center.
 

Since 2000, the clinic offers excellent standard implant and aesthetic dental services in a warm and welcoming environment. It is equiped with state of the art technology and equipment.

All dental assessments, including digital panoramic X-rays, and digital intra oral X-rays, are performed in house so no running around is necessary.

Dental services include implant placement and restoration, periodontal plastic surgery, periodontal pre-prosthetic surgery, bone grafting procedures and a wide range of cosmetic and prosthetic dental treatments including bridges, crowns, facings and total smile makeovers (using the digital smile design method - DSD).

We take time to listen to your goals and wishes of what will make you happy in terms of your dental health and appearance. Based on your wishes and Dr. Odysseos' professional dental assessment a tailored treatment is presented to you.
 

Using the most advanced equipment and the latest techniques in implant and aesthetic dentistry, we can make you smile again with confidence!

 

Testimonials

The best dental care I have ever experienced. Dr. Odysseos is a very talented and professional dentist with great expertise in his field. The dental practice is very clean and modern, and with the latest technology and know-how, Dr. Odysseos is able to create beautiful smiles for his patients. The staff there provide exceptional care and you feel safe under their hands. Now I want to smile all the time! The work Dr. Odysseos has done for me is top rated! I would highly recommend him to anyone seeking for a great dentist!

Katia Petri
06/06/2017

 

Nothing but the best, by an uncompromising professional who always strives for perfection.

Michael Ketonis
18/04/2017

 

Incredible results and excellent execution of complex dental problems that have remained unsolved for years.

The doctor and staff inspire trust. The visits along with the result become a pleasant experience that make patients feel confident and comfortable for their choice.

Dinos Iacovou
19/04/2017

 

Excellent professionally qualified staff, impeccable technical infrastructure.

Lygia Lamprou
06/03/2017

 

All my life I wanted pretty teeth and a pretty smile but I have never been able to make my wish come true. Ashamed to speak, ashamed to smile, difficulties with chewing food, frequent visits to numerous dentists, in Cyprus and abroad, experimenting different treatments that was my “teeth life” until May 2014 when I visited Dr. Odysseos clinic for the first time. I think one of the biggest compliments I get these days (and this was not the case three years ago) is, “You have a nice smile”. Yes, I do have a pretty smile, yes I can chew food, yes I can speak without putting my hand in front of my mouth and all these thanks to the professional achievements of Dr. Phanos Odysseos and his team. Merci doctor for this life changing gift!

E.T.
27/05/2017

 

13 years have passed from my first implant therapy and 6 years from my second treatment. Since then I have never had any problems with my teeth at all. My life has changed since i have had the implants placed and the improvement in several aspects of my life is noticeable. I have suffered greatly with previous solutions but the absolute success of my implant treatment from Dr. Odysseos has brought my life back to normal! I would like to say a big thank you to Dr. Odysseos for the precious medical services he has provided me. He has so positively changed my way of life!

Giannakis Constandinides
13/01/2016

 

My visits to Dr. Odysseos dental practice begun in March 2002 with the creation of a permanent fixed bridge. In 2007 I have had my lower teeth successfully restored with another fixed bridge. The quality of my life has improved dramatically and I can also enjoy things that were very difficult for me to enjoy prior to this restoration. Dr. Odysseos is a great scientist with an integral character and behavior. His and his stuff’s approach and compassionate care are unique and outstanding. It’s worth mentioning that he follows his appointment schedule strictly with no delay which is highly appreciated by his patients. The dental office premises as well as the equipment are of very high standard, in excellent condition and very clean.

Christakis Giorgakis
19/12/2015

 

Today it was my last visit at Dr. Odysseos’ dental practice. I would like to thank the doctor for the patience he has shown during the time of my treatment!!! Also I would like to thank Dr. Odysseos for the beautiful smile and the excellent treatment he has provided for me! I must say that my treatment was completed in a truly warm and hospitable environment.

Sincerely
Efi Ioannides
16/12/2015

 

Immaculate treatment and perfect professional services. Better than the treatment and service experienced at the University of Wisconsin in Madison USA.

Andreas Kazamias
University Professor
University of Wisconsin and University of Athens (Greece)
04/07/2016

 

In 2000 I have consulted various dentists regarding the placement of dental implants. At the same time I read about dental implants from written and online sources. Eventually I decided to trust, implant dentist Dr. Fanos Odysseos who inspired me for his excellent scientific knowledge, his communication skills and the integrity of his character. Since 2001 I have implants and I am completely satisfied with the result. Dr. Odysseos looks after me with great care. I thank him sincerely.

Fidias Kountouris
12/08/2016

 

I was 72 years old when I first visited my friend with very serious dental problems. I had dentures (μασελλάκια) on very little teeth and I was eating only soft foods. Dr. Fanos suggested that I placed implants and though I had my doubts at first I agreed. He has placed all implants in the lower jaw, and I must say they feel and function perfectly. On the upper jaw he created a fixed denture which also fits perfectly! Thank you my friend and doctor.

Angelos Singlis
16/09/2016

 

After being warned that a very slight tingling feeling might remain from placing a very difficult implant, I am more than delighted to say that Dr. Phanos Odysseos performed a miracle and I have a perfect tooth with no after effects and everything is normal! Thank you so much Dr. Odysseos for all your hard work, skills and patience.

Sincerely
Kim Cooper
14/11/2015

 

Mr. Odysseos is excellent at every stage of any procedure / surgery whether this might be surgical or aesthetic / cosmetic dentistry procedure. He always makes sure that the patient is feeling comfortable and is informed about what the step-by-step process will be, which is very important for me. I trust him completely and I recommend him without reservations.

Anonymous
04/03/2017

 

I feel like l different person! I can eat without any problem and smile without thinking that my interlocutor will be looking at me in a weird way because my teeth are very crooked or they have a gap in between them. In other words “I am very happy”.
Thank you my doctor.

N.G.
24/04/2017

 

Dr. Odysseos, I thank you so much for giving me my smile back and your service is second to home. I have been consulted by UK top dentist and didn't feel the confidence to go to them. My dental work needed was so difficult that they couldn't guarantee me the results I wanted. You did and delivered well above my expectation.
I will forever be grateful. Thank you so much.
I would not hesitate to recommend you to all my family and friends. The best!

Sara Pond
London-UK
09/06/2017
